name: places/ChIJCa-MgKZZwokR7QHHsD7IIbk

displayName.text: Togas House of Textiles | Upholstery & Luxury Home Goods

adrFormatAddress: 212 5th Ave, New York, NY 10010, USA

originalText.text:
Please don't shop here . After 55k in spendings 7 months later , my items arrived wrong .
Black out for living room 3 windows was installed in two different colors and they didn't notice which I have photos .

Items were cut too big for the window after a second time .

Guest bedroom black out shades needed were wrong - 2 times the wire was cut short and can not be put on the remote.

My son's bedroom Roman shade , fabric was sewed inside out .

My designer lead me to this place, and went MIA, avoid him too James Shute .

John the owner claims to have surgery each week and can not handle over seeing production. They switched install days on every set appointment and don't confirm.

7 months later and 55 k + , I have nothing to show for it .

Avoid like the plague . I am 6 on site visits . Shame on them as a company.

originalText.text: If there is an option of 0 star, I will give it. The company hold the installation about 8 months. And they scheduled the installation on last Tuesday, but never show up. I called the store to reschedule the installation in this morning, but the installation people coming without COI, which I told them twice and sent all the requirements to them.

originalText.text: This is a magnificent business. The greatest customer service in the world. They treat you like family. I just received my gorgeous sofa cushions. The fabric and workmanship is impeccable. They always go the extra mile. Tony is the best agent I've ever worked with. Tell them I sent you!

text.text: This is a magnificent business. The greatest customer service in the world. They treat you like family. I just received my gorgeous sofa cushions. The fabric and workmanship is impeccable. They always go the extra mile. Tony is the best agent I've ever worked with. Tell them I sent you!

originalText.text: I ordered curtains for 3 rooms in my house, and I had to get them in 3-4 weeks for a special event.  John K and his staff at Togas were great to work with and were very professional.  John guided me through every step from measuring my windows to ordering the curtains and reassured me about the installation process.  The curtains are simply stunning, made of quality material and beautiful designs.  I received my curtains within 10-14 days of ordering with plenty of time for installation for the big day. I highly recommend this company, and will order more in the future!

text.text: I ordered curtains for 3 rooms in my house, and I had to get them in 3-4 weeks for a special event.  John K and his staff at Togas were great to work with and were very professional. I highly recommend this company, and will order more in the future!

originalText.text: Togas is one of the premiere destinations in NYC for high end soft goods like bedding, throw pillows, etc.  If you're an interior designer like myself, you especially will be impressed with not only the selections in the showroom but the level of customer service.  I have had a good deal of custom work done by Togas and the quality is superior to any other workroom in NYC.  John K. and his team are simply the best.  I highly recommend seeking this place out for your design needs and impeccable custom work.
